titles.title: Transparency in Off-Campus Housing Act
To improve estimates of off-campus room and board for students at institutions of higher education, and for other purposes.
Transparency in Off-Campus Housing Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary:
Transparency in Off-Campus Housing Act
This bill requires the Department of Education to issue regulations prescribing a methodology that institutions of higher education shall use to determine the allowance for room and board costs incurred by students who live off-campus.
